entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
